Library Module API¶

lib.mainwindow¶

class lib.mainwindow.MainWindow(app, project_path=None)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QMainWindow

Variables

  • app (MyApp) – Object MyApp.

  • project (Project) –

    A Mainwindow object contains only one Project object.

    It is the data base.

  • menutopbar (MyMenuBar) –

  • wg_canvas (MyCanvas) –

    A self-defined QWidget component placed on the center of the mainwindow.

    It contains most of the ploting functions.

  • dwg_data (DockWidget_Data) –

    A self-defined QDockWidget placed on the left area by default.

    It contains a list of imported files and several functions interacting with the canvases in wg_canvas.

  • dwg_canvasLayout (DockWidget_CanvasLayout) –

    A self-defined QDockWidget placed on the left area by default.

    It contains functions of switching canvas layout mode, customizing canvas setting and post-processing.

initUI()[source]¶

Initial mainwindow’s user interface.

btn_clearData_handleClicked()[source]¶

This function connect with QPushButton component btn_clearData When the button is clicked, all imported datas and curves on canvases would be cleared.

btn_processingDlg_handleClicked()[source]¶

This function connect with QPushButton component btn_processingDlg When the button is clicked, execute OperationDialog and pop up a dialog window.

btn_axis_setting_handleClicked()[source]¶

This function connect with QPushButton component btn_axis_setting When the button is clicked, execute CanvasSetting_Dialog and pop up a dialog window.

It is used for customizing which curve types CurveType would be drawn on a canvas. Each canvas has main axis and sub axis. After dialog window closed, update related component with new setting.

append_file(file)[source]¶

Append a new imported file to attributes project, And also append to the treelist in DockWidget component dwg_data.

Parameters

file (FileData) – A FileData object generated from the imported file.

delete_files(filenames_to_del)[source]¶

Delete files from attributes project, And also delete curves data on the treelist in DockWidget component dwg_data.

Parameters

file (FileData) – A FileData object user intends to delete.

clear_files()[source]¶

Delete all the files in attributes project, And also clear curves data on the treelist in DockWidget component dwg_data.

save_file()[source]¶

Save project to file. If this project is “Untitled”, which is the default name for a new project, it would execute QFileDialog and pop up a dialog window letting user to determain a new name and where to save. Otherwise, it would be updated to the origin project file.

save_file_as()[source]¶

Save project to file. If this project is “Untitled”, which is the default name for a new project, it would execute QFileDialog and pop up a dialog window letting user to determain a new name and where to save. Otherwise, it would be updated to the origin project file.
